original_text: Azariah the chief priest, who was of the house of Zadok, answered him, “Since they began to bring the contributions into the house of the Lord, we have eaten and had enough and have plenty left, for the Lord has blessed his people, so that we have this large amount left.”
korean_text: 사독의 족속 대제사장 아사랴가 그에게 대답하여 이르되 백성이 예물을 여호와의 전에 드리기 시작함으로부터 우리가 만족하게 먹었으나 남은 것이 많으니 이는 여호와께서 그의 백성에게 복을 주셨음이라 그 남은 것이 이렇게 많이 쌓였나이다

sentences.original_text: who was of the house of Zadok,
“Since they began to bring the contributions
into the house of the Lord,
for the Lord has blessed his people,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 여호와께서 그의 백성에게 복을 주셨기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: so that we have this large amount left.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리에게 이렇게 많이 남게 된 것이니라.”
